docs.title: Deprecation & Retirement Notices
docs.text:
Retiring Within 30 Days — 2 model versions

These models require immediate migration. After the retirement date, API calls will return errors.

Model Version Category Retirement Date Status Replacement gpt-5-chat 2025-08-07 Text Generation 2026-03-01 Retiring Soon gpt-5.2-chat gpt-5-chat 2025-10-03 Text Generation 2026-03-01 Retiring Soon gpt-5.2-chat

Upcoming Retirements (31-90 Days) — 3 model versions

Plan and test your migration to the replacement model.

Model Version Category Retirement Date Status Replacement gpt-4o 2024-05-13 Text Generation 2026-03-31 Retiring gpt-5.1 gpt-4o 2024-08-06 Text Generation 2026-03-31 Retiring gpt-5.1 gpt-4o-mini 2024-07-18 Text Generation 2026-03-31 Retiring gpt-4.1-mini

Already Retired — 3 model versions

These models are no longer available. Migrate to the listed replacement.

Model Version Category Retirement Date Status Replacement gpt-4o-audio-preview 2024-12-17 Audio 2026-02-02 Retired gpt-audio gpt-4o-realtime-preview 2024-12-17 Audio 2026-02-02 Retired gpt-realtime dall-e-3 3 Image And Video 2026-02-18 Retired gpt-image-1-mini Deprecation vs Retirement — What's the Difference?

Deprecation marks a model version as no longer recommended. It still works, but no new deployments can be created. After deprecation you should begin migrating to the replacement model.

Retirement means the model version is fully removed. API calls will return errors after the retirement date. Always migrate before the retirement date.

Phase New Deployments Existing Deployments API Calls Active Allowed Running Working Deprecated Blocked Running Working Retired Blocked Removed Errors

See full retirement details and Microsoft's model lifecycle docs.

docs.title: Fine-Tuned Model Retirements
docs.text:
Fine-tuned models retire in two phases: training and deployment.

Model Version Training Retirement Deployment Retirement gpt-4o 2024-08-06 No earlier than 2026-09-31 (For existing customers only) 2027-03-31 gpt-4o-mini 2024-07-18 No earlier than 2026-09-31 (For existing customers only) 2027-03-31 gpt-4.1 2025-04-14 Base model retirement One year after training retirement gpt-4.1-mini 2025-04-14 Base model retirement One year after training retirement gpt-4.1-nano 2025-04-14 Base model retirement One year after training retirement o4-mini 2025-04-16 Base model retirement One year after training retirement

Fine-Tuning Retirement Policy

  • Training retirement: After this date, you cannot create new fine-tuned models.
  • Deployment retirement: After this date, inference and deployment return errors.
  • Models you've already trained remain available until deployment retirement.

docs.text: Status Description Action Required Retiring Soon Within 30 days Immediate migration required Retiring 31-90 days Plan and test migration Scheduled 91+ days Monitor and prepare Planned Date not finalized Stay informed Retired No longer available Migration required
